queries.text:
from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_output_power_dc")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_realtime_wattage_sum")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_combined_wattage_sum")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_watts")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_pmb_voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_state_of_charge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

colors.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

queries.text:
from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_kwh_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_l1_kwh_bought_today" or r["_field"] == "grid_l2_kwh_bought_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.grid_l1_kwh_bought_today + r.grid_l2_kwh_bought_today}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_kwh_charging_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_kwh_discharging_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_output_power_dc" or r["_field"] == "grid_realtime_wattage_sum" or r["_field"] == "battery_watts")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lastAlert")
  |> unique()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> yield(name: "unique")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lastNotice" )
  |> unique()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> yield(name: "unique")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_input_current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_l1_kwh_consumed_today" or r["_field"] == "load_l2_kwh_consumed_today")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.load_l1_kwh_consumed_today + r.load_l2_kwh_consumed_today}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_combined_l1_wattage" or r["_field"] == "load_combined_l2_wattage" or r["_field"] == "load_unprotected_l1_wattage" or r["_field"] == "load_unprotected_l2_wattage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r.load_combined_l1_wattage + r.load_combined_l2_wattage) - (r.load_unprotected_l1_wattage + r.load_unprotected_l2_wattage)}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_combined_l1_wattage" or r["_field"] == "load_combined_l2_wattage" or r["_field"] == "load_unprotected_l1_wattage" or r["_field"] == "load_unprotected_l2_wattage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r.load_unprotected_l1_wattage + r.load_unprotected_l2_wattage)}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pv_mwh_lifetime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.pv_mwh_lifetime * 1000.0}))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "zack.hr's Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "skybox")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_l1_mwh_bought_lifetime" or r["_field"] == "grid_l2_mwh_bought_lifetime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 1000.0 * (r.grid_l1_mwh_bought_lifetime + r.grid_l2_mwh_bought_lifetime)}))
  |> yield(name: "last")
